an4.18:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these four ways of not taking a wrong course. What four? One does not take a wrong course because of desire, because of hatred, because of delusion, or because of fear. These are the four ways of not taking a wrong course."
an4.18:2: If one does not transgress the Dhammathrough desire, hate, fear, or delusion,one's fame becomes full like the moonin the bright fortnight.
